LanguageData.JRWAntarctopelta.label: Antarctopelta
LanguageData.JRWAntarctopelta.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02817-1986 [ANTARCTOPELTA OLIVEROI] CODENAME: T-28 >95
An odd ankylosaurid with a slender form and large, curved spikes. What it lacks in brute strength it makes up for in tenacity.
LanguageData.JRWAntarctopelta.tools.head.label: head
